session.title: Building Cloud-Native Applications at Scale
session.speaker: Alex Thompson
session.summary: This keynote explores the fundamentals of building and deploying cloud-native applications that can scale to millions of users. Alex Thompson shares insights from leading engineering teams at major tech companies, covering microservices architecture, containerization with Docker and Kubernetes, and serverless computing patterns. The presentation includes practical strategies for service mesh implementation, observability, and monitoring in distributed systems. Key topics include container orchestration best practices, CI/CD pipeline optimization, and infrastructure as code. Attendees will learn how to design resilient, scalable applications that leverage cloud platforms effectively while maintaining development velocity and operational excellence.
